That's okay. Im just gonna give you a summary though. Astroblast 
landed, and Megatron, Motormaster and Switchblade exited him. 
Wildrider told Megatron they had found this Decepticon (Cepta). 
Megatron orders the Decepticons to all stay here and wait for 
reinforcements, except for Cepta and himself, who wer to enter 
Astroblast. In all the excitement rAuq took off though, so If you do 
decide to get on, you will have to wait till he lands.
